lines: WATCH FOR THE TIME IS SHORT
Kolindila lino, ciindi cilafwafwi, mutawi mucibi, linda upaile;
Ndateteeta ime, sinkondoma mubi; Kamulinda nyonse, ulabola Jesu.
Lindilila, lindilila, Busiku asikati Lindilila, a kupaila.
Mutabi balenga, mu myoyo miyumu, Muya kulyokezya kujulu kolinda;
Kolinda, paila, Mufutuli wenu, Waka tu pengela, nkaambo twakabija.
Usyoma Jesu Saatani tamuyandi, Kosama zilwanyo, limwi JesÕ aboole
Mutamuki buzuba, bubotu obu, Kamulinda nyonse, a kupailisya.
